SEARCH
Package shapes.derived

Class Rectangle

java.lang.Object
shapes.base.VectorialObject
shapes.derived.Rectangle
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Cloneable, Movable, Transformable
public class Rectangle extends VectorialObject
Represents a drawable rectangle shape with optional rounded corners.

Inherits transformation, color, and stroke properties from VectorialObject.

See Also:
  • Serialized Form

  • Constructor Details

    • Rectangle

      public Rectangle()
      Constructs a Rectangle with random position and default colors.

    • Rectangle

      public Rectangle(double x, double y, double lineWidth, Color fillColor, Color strokeColor)
      Constructs a Rectangle with specified position, line width, fill color, and stroke color.
      Parameters:
      x - the x-coordinate of the rectangle's top-left corner
      y - the y-coordinate of the rectangle's top-left corner
      lineWidth - the stroke width
      fillColor - the fill (interior) color
      strokeColor - the stroke (border) color
